about.heading: Complete Web Experience Creator
about.paragraph1: With 13 years of experience in web development, I've evolved from junior frontend developer to senior full stack expert. My journey has allowed me to master the entire application creation cycle: from initial webdesign with Figma to production deployment. My versatility enables me to work with React, TypeScript, Node.js and PHP according to project needs.
about.paragraph2: Graduated with a BES WEBDEVELOPER degree from Paul Hankar Institute in Brussels (2007-2011), I started at Axecible in Lille before evolving at PÃ©pin d'Pomme in Tournai and then at Optesite in Brussels where I've held a senior position for 10 years. This rich international experience has allowed me to work on varied projects, from e-commerce to complex enterprise applications.
about.paragraph3: My expertise covers complete web application architecture: frontend/backend development, database management (MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase), DevOps (Docker, CI/CD), third-party service integration, and performance optimization. With over 100 delivered projects, I ensure that every solution is scalable, tested, and maintainable in the long term.
